content: Lingxuzi is a required Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 1 of Black Myth Wukong. Located at the end of the Forest of Wolves, this towering Wolf Guai will be your first true test for taking on very strong and very large boss enemies.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lingxuzi.md', within the main section titled 'Lingxuzi'.
The content is as follows:
Lingxuzi is a required Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 1 of Black Myth Wukong. Located at the end of the Forest of Wolves, this towering Wolf Guai will be your first true test for taking on very strong and very large boss enemies.
